sourcesContent: import{isDesignToken as r}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{getCSSVariableIfValueIsThemeKey as t}from"../utils.js";const o=({breakpoint:o,breakpoints:e,propKey:i,values:n})=>{if(r(n))return n.toString();if("object"!=typeof n)return t(i,n);let s={};const p=Object.keys(e).sort(((r,t)=>e[r]-e[t]));return Array.isArray(n)?n.map(((r,t)=>{s[p[t]]=r})):s=n,(({breakpoint:o,breakpoints:e,propKey:i,values:n})=>{if(void 0!==n[o]){const e=n[o];return r(e)?e.toString():t(i,e)}const s=Object.keys(e).sort(((r,t)=>e[t]-e[r])),p=s.slice(s.indexOf(o));for(const o of p)if(void 0!==n[o]){const e=n[o];return r(e)?e.toString():t(i,e)}return null})({breakpoint:o,breakpoints:e,propKey:i,values:s})};export{o as getValueAtCurrentBreakpoint};
